Serialized Form

  • Package &lt;Unnamed&gt;

    • Class DunkAProf extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gamePanel

          GamePanel gamePanel
          This is a reference to the JPanel where all the action takes place. If you're not sure why a JPanel is used, please refer to the Java documentation (http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/) on JFrame and JPanel. In short, JFrame (in this context) is used as a simple container that will have the sole responsibility of rendering the JPanel and minor window functions. This allows for flexibility and better organization of game components and game logic.

    • Class GamePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • panelWidth

          int panelWidth
          This is the used to store the width of the JPanel.

        • panelHeight

          int panelHeight
          This is used to store the height of the JPanel.

        • animator

          java.lang.Thread animator
          This is the thread that performs the animation.

        • running

          boolean running
          This is used to stop the game animation

        • isPaused

          boolean isPaused
          This is used to pause the game.

        • gameOver

          boolean gameOver
          This is used to indicate that the game is over.

        • font

          java.awt.Font font
          This is used to store the font used for text in the game.

        • metrics

          java.awt.FontMetrics metrics
          This encapsulates information about the rendering of the font used for text in the game.

        • background

          Background background
          This class is used to manage the background image.

        • professor

          Professor professor
          This class contains graphics (draw logic and images), actions (dunk logic), etc for an object that will represent the Professor for the game.

        • dean

          Dean dean
          This class contains graphics (draw logic and images), actions (dunk logic), etc for an object that will represent the Dean for the game.

        • trustee

          Trustee trustee
          This is the class that controls the game logic which governs the motion of the trustee and its appearance in the game.

        • slider

          Slider slider
          This is the object used as a starting point for our projectiles in the game. This object slides back and forth on an x axis just below the dunk tanks.

        • pool

          Pool[] pool
          This array of Pool objects are the dunk tanks used to dunk the faculty members. A pool is considered a dunk tank.

        • projectile

          Projectile projectile
          Object used to hit the targets near the faculty.

        • clock

          Clock clock
          Represents the Game clock/time limit for this game.

        • score

          Score score
          This class keeps track of the score in the game as well as the a few attributes such as Font, Color and xy coordinates.

        • window

          DunkAProf window
          This is used to store a reference to the JFrame

        • paused

          Paused paused
          This is used to store the image and location of the paused graphic.

        • screenGraphics

          java.awt.Graphics screenGraphics
          Stores the main graphics for the application.

        • screenImage

          java.awt.Image screenImage
          Stores the frame component for this game that used to set the screenGraphics variable.
